resources.string:
Hi, my name is Saikat Rahman.

I am a software engineer.

Now I work in Summit Communication Limited as an android developer.

I complete my graduation BSc in CSE from Daffodil International University and now I study my post-graduation MSc in CSE (MAJOR IN DATA SCIENCE) from Daffodil International University.

My dream is to work with a giant company as a software engineer.

I am very passionate about my career. I want to see myself as a team leader with some intelligent DEV OPS Community.

My dream is to develop software for everyone in a new era.

I love to read books, watching series, movies.
